QuestData.Title: The Caverns of Time
QuestData.Description: Greetings, $n. Please follow the custodian. She will make things a bit more... clear.
QuestData.LogDescription: Andormu at the Caverns of Time has asked that you follow the Custodian of Time around the cavern.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Andormu at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do not return until you have at least a rudimentary understanding of what is happening.
QuestData.RewardText: Hopefully you now have a better understanding of what is expected of you.
